00059 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00060 {
00061     ExplodeModifierData *emd= (ExplodeModifierData*) md;
00062 
00063     emd->facepa= NULL;
00064     emd->flag |= eExplodeFlag_Unborn+eExplodeFlag_Alive+eExplodeFlag_Dead;
00065 }
00066 static void freeData(ModifierData *md)
00067 {
00068     ExplodeModifierData *emd= (ExplodeModifierData*) md;
00069     
00070     if (emd->facepa) MEM_freeN(emd->facepa);
00071 }
00072 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00073 {
00074     ExplodeModifierData *emd= (ExplodeModifierData*) md;
00075     ExplodeModifierData *temd= (ExplodeModifierData*) target;
00076 
00077     temd->facepa = NULL;
00078     temd->flag = emd->flag;
00079     temd->protect = emd->protect;
00080     temd->vgroup = emd->vgroup;
00081 }
00082 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *UNUSED(md)) 
00083 {
00084     return 1;
00085 }
00086 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00087 {
00088     ExplodeModifierData *emd= (ExplodeModifierData*) md;
00089     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00090 
00091     if (emd->vgroup)
00092         dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00093 
00094     return dataMask;
00095 }
00096 
00097 static void createFacepa(ExplodeModifierData *emd,
00098                         ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd,
00099                         DerivedMesh *dm)
00100 {
00101     ParticleSystem *psys=psmd->psys;
00102     MFace *fa=NULL, *mface=NULL;
00103     MVert *mvert = NULL;
00104     ParticleData *pa;
00105     KDTree *tree;
00106     float center[3], co[3];
00107     int *facepa=NULL,*vertpa=NULL,totvert=0,totface=0,totpart=0;
00108     int i,p,v1,v2,v3,v4=0;
00109 
00110     mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00111     mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00112     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00113     totvert= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00114     totpart= psmd->psys->totpart;
00115 
00116     BLI_srandom(psys->seed);
00117 
00118     if (emd->facepa)
00119         MEM_freeN(emd->facepa);
00120 
00121     facepa = emd->facepa = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totface, "explode_facepa");
00122 
00123     vertpa = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totvert, "explode_vertpa");
00124 
00125     /* initialize all faces & verts to no particle */
00126     for (i=0; i<totface; i++)
00127         facepa[i]=totpart;
00128 
00129     for (i=0; i<totvert; i++)
00130         vertpa[i]=totpart;
00131 
00132     /* set protected verts */
00133     if (emd->vgroup) {
00134         MDeformVert *dvert = dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00135         if (dvert) {
00136             const int defgrp_index= emd->vgroup-1;
00137             for (i=0; i<totvert; i++, dvert++) {
00138                 float val = BLI_frand();
00139                 val = (1.0f-emd->protect)*val + emd->protect*0.5f;
00140                 if (val < defvert_find_weight(dvert, defgrp_index))
00141                     vertpa[i] = -1;
00142             }
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00146     /* make tree of emitter locations */
00147     tree=BLI_kdtree_new(totpart);
00148     for (p=0,pa=psys->particles; p<totpart; p++,pa++) {
00149         psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,co,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00150         BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, p, co, NULL);
00151     }
00152     BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
00153 
00154     /* set face-particle-indexes to nearest particle to face center */
00155     for (i=0,fa=mface; i<totface; i++,fa++) {
00156         add_v3_v3v3(center,mvert[fa->v1].co,mvert[fa->v2].co);
00157         add_v3_v3(center, mvert[fa->v3].co);
00158         if (fa->v4) {
00159             add_v3_v3(center, mvert[fa->v4].co);
00160             mul_v3_fl(center,0.25);
00161         }
00162         else
00163             mul_v3_fl(center,0.3333f);
00164 
00165         p= BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(tree,center,NULL,NULL);
00166 
00167         v1=vertpa[fa->v1];
00168         v2=vertpa[fa->v2];
00169         v3=vertpa[fa->v3];
00170         if (fa->v4)
00171             v4=vertpa[fa->v4];
00172 
00173         if (v1>=0 && v2>=0 && v3>=0 && (fa->v4==0 || v4>=0))
00174             facepa[i]=p;
00175 
00176         if (v1>=0) vertpa[fa->v1]=p;
00177         if (v2>=0) vertpa[fa->v2]=p;
00178         if (v3>=0) vertpa[fa->v3]=p;
00179         if (fa->v4 && v4>=0) vertpa[fa->v4]=p;
00180     }
00181 
00182     if (vertpa) MEM_freeN(vertpa);
00183     BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
00184 }
00185 
00186 static int edgecut_get(EdgeHash *edgehash, unsigned int v1, unsigned int v2)
00187 {
00188     return GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(edgehash, v1, v2));
00189 }

00192 static const short add_faces[24] = {
00193     0,
00194     0, 0, 2, 0, 1, 2, 2, 0, 2, 1,
00195     2, 2, 2, 2, 3, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0,
00196     1, 1, 2
00197  };

00199 static MFace *get_dface(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int cur, int i, MFace *mf)
00200 {
00201     MFace *df = CDDM_get_tessface(split, cur);
00202     DM_copy_tessface_data(dm, split, i, cur, 1);
00203     *df = *mf;
00204     return df;
00205 }
00206 
00207 #define SET_VERTS(a, b, c, d) \
00208         v[0] = mf->v##a; uv[0]=a-1; \
00209         v[1] = mf->v##b; uv[1]=b-1; \
00210         v[2] = mf->v##c; uv[2]=c-1; \
00211         v[3] = mf->v##d; uv[3]=d-1; \
00212         (void)0
00213 
00214 #define GET_ES(v1, v2) edgecut_get(eh, v1, v2)
00215 #define INT_UV(uvf, c0, c1) interp_v2_v2v2(uvf, mf->uv[c0], mf->uv[c1], 0.5f)
00216 
00217 static void remap_faces_3_6_9_12(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, MFace *mf, int *facepa, int *vertpa, int i, EdgeHash *eh, int cur, int v1, int v2, int v3, int v4)
00218 {
00219     MFace *df1 = get_dface(dm, split, cur, i, mf);
00220     MFace *df2 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+1, i, mf);
00221     MFace *df3 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+2, i, mf);
00222 
00223     facepa[cur] = vertpa[v1];
00224     df1->v1 = v1;
00225     df1->v2 = GET_ES(v1, v2);
00226     df1->v3 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00227     df1->v4 = v3;
00228     df1->flag |= ME_FACE_SEL;
00229 
00230     facepa[cur+1] = vertpa[v2];
00231     df2->v1 = GET_ES(v1, v2);
00232     df2->v2 = v2;
00233     df2->v3 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00234     df2->v4 = 0;
00235     df2->flag &= ~ME_FACE_SEL;
00236 
00237     facepa[cur+2] = vertpa[v1];
00238     df3->v1 = v1;
00239     df3->v2 = v3;
00240     df3->v3 = v4;
00241     df3->v4 = 0;
00242     df3->flag &= ~ME_FACE_SEL;
00243 }
00244 
00245 static void remap_uvs_3_6_9_12(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int numlayer, int i, int cur, int c0, int c1, int c2, int c3)
00246 {
00247     MTFace *mf, *df1, *df2, *df3;
00248     int l;
00249 
00250     for (l=0; l<numlayer; l++) {
00251         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&split->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00252         df1 = mf+cur;
00253         df2 = df1 + 1;
00254         df3 = df1 + 2;
00255         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00256         mf += i;
00257 
00258         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00259         INT_UV(df1->uv[1], c0, c1);
00260         INT_UV(df1->uv[2], c1, c2);
00261         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[3], mf->uv[c2]);
00262 
00263         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c1);
00264         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[1], mf->uv[c1]);
00265         INT_UV(df2->uv[2], c1, c2);
00266 
00267         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00268         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[1], mf->uv[c2]);
00269         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[2], mf->uv[c3]);
00270     }
00271 }

00273 static void remap_faces_5_10(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, MFace *mf, int *facepa, int *vertpa, int i, EdgeHash *eh, int cur, int v1, int v2, int v3, int v4)
00274 {
00275     MFace *df1 = get_dface(dm, split, cur, i, mf);
00276     MFace *df2 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+1, i, mf);
00277 
00278     facepa[cur] = vertpa[v1];
00279     df1->v1 = v1;
00280     df1->v2 = v2;
00281     df1->v3 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00282     df1->v4 = GET_ES(v1, v4);
00283     df1->flag |= ME_FACE_SEL;
00284 
00285     facepa[cur+1] = vertpa[v3];
00286     df2->v1 = GET_ES(v1, v4);
00287     df2->v2 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00288     df2->v3 = v3;
00289     df2->v4 = v4;
00290     df2->flag |= ME_FACE_SEL;
00291 }

00293 static void remap_uvs_5_10(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int numlayer, int i, int cur, int c0, int c1, int c2, int c3)
00294 {
00295     MTFace *mf, *df1, *df2;
00296     int l;
00297 
00298     for (l=0; l<numlayer; l++) {
00299         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&split->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00300         df1 = mf+cur;
00301         df2 = df1 + 1;
00302         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00303         mf += i;
00304 
00305         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00306         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[1], mf->uv[c1]);
00307         INT_UV(df1->uv[2], c1, c2);
00308         INT_UV(df1->uv[3], c0, c3);
00309 
00310         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c3);
00311         INT_UV(df2->uv[1], c1, c2);
00312         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[2], mf->uv[c2]);
00313         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[3], mf->uv[c3]);
00314 
00315     }
00316 }

00318 static void remap_faces_15(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, MFace *mf, int *facepa, int *vertpa, int i, EdgeHash *eh, int cur, int v1, int v2, int v3, int v4)

00323     MFace *df4 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+3, i, mf);
00324 
00325     facepa[cur] = vertpa[v1];

00345

00354 static void remap_uvs_15(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int numlayer, int i, int cur, int c0, int c1, int c2, int c3)
00355 {
00356     MTFace *mf, *df1, *df2, *df3, *df4;
00357     int l;
00358 
00359     for (l=0; l<numlayer; l++) {
00360         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&split->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00361         df1 = mf+cur;
00362         df2 = df1 + 1;
00363         df3 = df1 + 2;
00364         df4 = df1 + 3;
00365         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00366         mf += i;
00367 
00368         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00369         INT_UV(df1->uv[1], c0, c1);
00370         INT_UV(df1->uv[2], c0, c2);
00371         INT_UV(df1->uv[3], c0, c3);
00372 
00373         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c1);
00374         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[1], mf->uv[c1]);
00375         INT_UV(df2->uv[2], c1, c2);
00376         INT_UV(df2->uv[3], c0, c2);
00377 
00378         INT_UV(df3->uv[0], c0, c2);
00379         INT_UV(df3->uv[1], c1, c2);
00380         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[2], mf->uv[c2]);
00381         INT_UV(df3->uv[3], c2, c3);
00382 
00383         INT_UV(df4->uv[0], c0, c3);
00384         INT_UV(df4->uv[1], c0, c2);
00385         INT_UV(df4->uv[2], c2, c3);
00386         copy_v2_v2(df4->uv[3], mf->uv[c3]);
00387     }
00388 }

00418 static void remap_uvs_7_11_13_14(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int numlayer, int i, int cur, int c0, int c1, int c2, int c3)
00419 {
00420     MTFace *mf, *df1, *df2, *df3;
00421     int l;
00422 
00423     for (l=0; l<numlayer; l++) {
00424         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&split->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00425         df1 = mf+cur;
00426         df2 = df1 + 1;
00427         df3 = df1 + 2;
00428         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00429         mf += i;
00430 
00431         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00432         INT_UV(df1->uv[1], c0, c1);
00433         INT_UV(df1->uv[2], c1, c2);
00434         INT_UV(df1->uv[3], c0, c3);
00435 
00436         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c1);
00437         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[1], mf->uv[c1]);
00438         INT_UV(df2->uv[2], c1, c2);
00439 
00440         INT_UV(df3->uv[0], c0, c3);
00441         INT_UV(df3->uv[1], c1, c2);
00442         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[2], mf->uv[c2]);
00443         copy_v2_v2(df3->uv[3], mf->uv[c3]);
00444     }
00445 }

00490 static void remap_faces_23(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, MFace *mf, int *facepa, int *vertpa, int i, EdgeHash *eh, int cur, int v1, int v2, int v3)
00491 {
00492     MFace *df1 = get_dface(dm, split, cur, i, mf);
00493     MFace *df2 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+1, i, mf);
00494     MFace *df3 = get_dface(dm, split, cur+2, i, mf);
00495 
00496     facepa[cur] = vertpa[v1];
00497     df1->v1 = v1;
00498     df1->v2 = GET_ES(v1, v2);
00499     df1->v3 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00500     df1->v4 = GET_ES(v1, v3);
00501     df1->flag |= ME_FACE_SEL;
00502 
00503     facepa[cur+1] = vertpa[v2];
00504     df2->v1 = GET_ES(v1, v2);
00505     df2->v2 = v2;
00506     df2->v3 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00507     df2->v4 = 0;
00508     df2->flag &= ~ME_FACE_SEL;
00509 
00510     facepa[cur+2] = vertpa[v3];
00511     df3->v1 = GET_ES(v1, v3);
00512     df3->v2 = GET_ES(v2, v3);
00513     df3->v3 = v3;
00514     df3->v4 = 0;
00515     df3->flag &= ~ME_FACE_SEL;
00516 }
00517 
00518 static void remap_uvs_23(DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *split, int numlayer, int i, int cur, int c0, int c1, int c2)
00519 {
00520     MTFace *mf, *df1, *df2;
00521     int l;
00522 
00523     for (l=0; l<numlayer; l++) {
00524         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&split->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00525         df1 = mf+cur;
00526         df2 = df1 + 1;
00527         mf = CustomData_get_layer_n(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, l);
00528         mf += i;
00529 
00530         copy_v2_v2(df1->uv[0], mf->uv[c0]);
00531         INT_UV(df1->uv[1], c0, c1);
00532         INT_UV(df1->uv[2], c1, c2);
00533         INT_UV(df1->uv[3], c0, c2);
00534 
00535         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c1);
00536         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[1], mf->uv[c1]);
00537         INT_UV(df2->uv[2], c1, c2);
00538 
00539         INT_UV(df2->uv[0], c0, c2);
00540         INT_UV(df2->uv[1], c1, c2);
00541         copy_v2_v2(df2->uv[2], mf->uv[c2]);
00542     }
00543 }
00544 
00545 static DerivedMesh * cutEdges(ExplodeModifierData *emd, DerivedMesh *dm)
00546 {
00547     DerivedMesh *splitdm;
00548     MFace *mf=NULL,*df1=NULL;
00549     MFace *mface=dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00550     MVert *dupve, *mv;
00551     EdgeHash *edgehash;
00552     EdgeHashIterator *ehi;
00553     int totvert=dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00554     int totface=dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00555 
00556     int *facesplit = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totface,"explode_facesplit");
00557     int *vertpa = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totvert,"explode_vertpa2");
00558     int *facepa = emd->facepa;
00559     int *fs, totesplit=0,totfsplit=0,curdupface=0;
00560     int i, v1, v2, v3, v4, esplit,
00561         v[4]  = {0, 0, 0, 0}, /* To quite gcc barking... */
00562         uv[4] = {0, 0, 0, 0}; /* To quite gcc barking... */
00563     int numlayer;
00564     unsigned int ed_v1, ed_v2;
00565 
00566     edgehash= BLI_edgehash_new();
00567 
00568     /* recreate vertpa from facepa calculation */
00569     for (i=0,mf=mface; i<totface; i++,mf++) {
00570         vertpa[mf->v1]=facepa[i];
00571         vertpa[mf->v2]=facepa[i];
00572         vertpa[mf->v3]=facepa[i];
00573         if (mf->v4)
00574             vertpa[mf->v4]=facepa[i];
00575     }
00576 
00577     /* mark edges for splitting and how to split faces */
00578     for (i=0,mf=mface,fs=facesplit; i<totface; i++,mf++,fs++) {
00579         v1=vertpa[mf->v1];
00580         v2=vertpa[mf->v2];
00581         v3=vertpa[mf->v3];
00582 
00583         if (v1!=v2) {
00584             BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v1, mf->v2, NULL);
00585             (*fs) |= 1;
00586         }
00587 
00588         if (v2!=v3) {
00589             BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v2, mf->v3, NULL);
00590             (*fs) |= 2;
00591         }
00592 
00593         if (mf->v4) {
00594             v4=vertpa[mf->v4];
00595 
00596             if (v3!=v4) {
00597                 BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v3, mf->v4, NULL);
00598                 (*fs) |= 4;
00599             }
00600 
00601             if (v1!=v4) {
00602                 BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v1, mf->v4, NULL);
00603                 (*fs) |= 8;
00604             }
00605 
00606             /* mark center vertex as a fake edge split */
00607             if (*fs == 15)
00608                 BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v1, mf->v3, NULL);
00609         }
00610         else {
00611             (*fs) |= 16; /* mark face as tri */
00612 
00613             if (v1!=v3) {
00614                 BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, mf->v1, mf->v3, NULL);
00615                 (*fs) |= 4;
00616             }
00617         }
00618     }
00619 
00620     /* count splits & create indexes for new verts */
00621     ehi= BLI_edgehashIterator_new(edgehash);
00622     totesplit=totvert;
00623     for (; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi)) {
00624         BLI_edgehashIterator_setValue(ehi, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(totesplit));
00625         totesplit++;
00626     }
00627     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
00628 
00629     /* count new faces due to splitting */
00630     for (i=0,fs=facesplit; i<totface; i++,fs++)
00631         totfsplit += add_faces[*fs];
00632     
00633     splitdm= CDDM_from_template(dm, totesplit, 0, totface+totfsplit, 0, 0);
00634     numlayer = CustomData_number_of_layers(&splitdm->faceData, CD_MTFACE);
00635 
00636     /* copy new faces & verts (is it really this painful with custom data??) */
00637     for (i=0; i<totvert; i++) {
00638         MVert source;
00639         MVert *dest;
00640         dm->getVert(dm, i, &source);
00641         dest = CDDM_get_vert(splitdm, i);
00642 
00643         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, splitdm, i, i, 1);
00644         *dest = source;
00645     }
00646 
00647     /* override original facepa (original pointer is saved in caller function) */
00648 
00649     /* BMESH_TODO, (totfsplit * 2) over allocation is used since the quads are
00650      * later interpreted as tri's, for this to work right I think we probably
00651      * have to stop using tessface - campbell */
00652 
00653     facepa= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*(totface+(totfsplit * 2)),"explode_facepa");
00654     //memcpy(facepa,emd->facepa,totface*sizeof(int));
00655     emd->facepa=facepa;
00656 
00657     /* create new verts */
00658     ehi= BLI_edgehashIterator_new(edgehash);
00659     for (; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi)) {
00660         BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(ehi, &ed_v1, &ed_v2);
00661         esplit= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(ehi));
00662         mv=CDDM_get_vert(splitdm, ed_v2);
00663         dupve=CDDM_get_vert(splitdm,esplit);
00664 
00665         DM_copy_vert_data(splitdm,splitdm, ed_v2, esplit,1);
00666 
00667         *dupve=*mv;
00668 
00669         mv=CDDM_get_vert(splitdm, ed_v1);
00670 
00671         add_v3_v3(dupve->co, mv->co);
00672         mul_v3_fl(dupve->co, 0.5f);
00673     }
00674     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
00675 
00676     /* create new faces */
00677     curdupface=0;//=totface;
00678     //curdupin=totesplit;
00679     for (i=0,fs=facesplit; i<totface; i++,fs++) {
00680         mf = dm->getTessFaceData(dm, i, CD_MFACE);
00681 
00682         switch(*fs) {
00683         case 3:
00684         case 10:
00685         case 11:
00686         case 15:
00687             SET_VERTS(1, 2, 3, 4);
00688             break;
00689         case 5:
00690         case 6:
00691         case 7:
00692             SET_VERTS(2, 3, 4, 1);
00693             break;
00694         case 9:
00695         case 13:
00696             SET_VERTS(4, 1, 2, 3);
00697             break;
00698         case 12:
00699         case 14:
00700             SET_VERTS(3, 4, 1, 2);
00701             break;
00702         case 21:
00703         case 23:
00704             SET_VERTS(1, 2, 3, 4);
00705             break;
00706         case 19:
00707             SET_VERTS(2, 3, 1, 4);
00708             break;
00709         case 22:
00710             SET_VERTS(3, 1, 2, 4);
00711             break;
00712         }
00713 
00714         switch(*fs) {
00715         case 3:
00716         case 6:
00717         case 9:
00718         case 12:
00719             remap_faces_3_6_9_12(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);
00720             if (numlayer)
00721                 remap_uvs_3_6_9_12(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2], uv[3]);
00722             break;
00723         case 5:
00724         case 10:
00725             remap_faces_5_10(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);
00726             if (numlayer)
00727                 remap_uvs_5_10(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2], uv[3]);
00728             break;
00729         case 15:
00730             remap_faces_15(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);
00731             if (numlayer)
00732                 remap_uvs_15(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2], uv[3]);
00733             break;
00734         case 7:
00735         case 11:
00736         case 13:
00737         case 14:
00738             remap_faces_7_11_13_14(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);
00739             if (numlayer)
00740                 remap_uvs_7_11_13_14(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2], uv[3]);
00741             break;
00742         case 19:
00743         case 21:
00744         case 22:
00745             remap_faces_19_21_22(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2]);
00746             if (numlayer)
00747                 remap_uvs_19_21_22(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]);
00748             break;
00749         case 23:
00750             remap_faces_23(dm, splitdm, mf, facepa, vertpa, i, edgehash, curdupface, v[0], v[1], v[2]);
00751             if (numlayer)
00752                 remap_uvs_23(dm, splitdm, numlayer, i, curdupface, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]);
00753             break;
00754         case 0:
00755         case 16:
00756             df1 = get_dface(dm, splitdm, curdupface, i, mf);
00757             facepa[curdupface] = vertpa[mf->v1];
00758 
00759             if (df1->v4)
00760                 df1->flag |= ME_FACE_SEL;
00761             else
00762                 df1->flag &= ~ME_FACE_SEL;
00763             break;
00764         }
00765 
00766         curdupface += add_faces[*fs]+1;
00767     }
00768 
00769     for (i=0; i<curdupface; i++) {
00770         mf = CDDM_get_tessface(splitdm, i);
00771         test_index_face(mf, &splitdm->faceData, i, (mf->flag & ME_FACE_SEL ? 4 : 3));
00772     }
00773 
00774     BLI_edgehash_free(edgehash, NULL);
00775     MEM_freeN(facesplit);
00776     MEM_freeN(vertpa);
00777 
00778     CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(splitdm);
00779     CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(splitdm); /*builds ngon faces from tess (mface) faces*/
00780 
00781     return splitdm;
00782 }
00783 static DerivedMesh * explodeMesh(ExplodeModifierData *emd, 
00784         ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd, Scene *scene, Object *ob, 
00785   DerivedMesh *to_explode)
00786 {
00787     DerivedMesh *explode, *dm=to_explode;
00788     MFace *mf= NULL, *mface;
00789     /* ParticleSettings *part=psmd->psys->part; */ /* UNUSED */
00790     ParticleSimulationData sim= {NULL};
00791     ParticleData *pa=NULL, *pars=psmd->psys->particles;
00792     ParticleKey state, birth;
00793     EdgeHash *vertpahash;
00794     EdgeHashIterator *ehi;
00795     float *vertco= NULL, imat[4][4];
00796     float rot[4];
00797     float cfra;
00798     /* float timestep; */
00799     int *facepa=emd->facepa;
00800     int totdup=0,totvert=0,totface=0,totpart=0,delface=0;
00801     int i, v, u;
00802     unsigned int ed_v1, ed_v2, mindex=0;
00803     MTFace *mtface = NULL, *mtf;
00804 
00805     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00806     totvert= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00807     mface= dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00808     totpart= psmd->psys->totpart;
00809 
00810     sim.scene= scene;
00811     sim.ob= ob;
00812     sim.psys= psmd->psys;
00813     sim.psmd= psmd;
00814 
00815     /* timestep= psys_get_timestep(&sim); */
00816 
00817     cfra= BKE_curframe(scene);
00818 
00819     /* hash table for vertice <-> particle relations */
00820     vertpahash= BLI_edgehash_new();
00821 
00822     for (i=0; i<totface; i++) {
00823         if (facepa[i] != totpart) {
00824             pa = pars + facepa[i];
00825 
00826             if ((pa->alive == PARS_UNBORN && (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_Unborn) == 0) ||
00827                 (pa->alive == PARS_ALIVE && (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_Alive) == 0) ||
00828                 (pa->alive == PARS_DEAD && (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_Dead) == 0))
00829             {
00830                 delface++;
00831                 continue;
00832             }
00833         }
00834 
00835         /* do mindex + totvert to ensure the vertex index to be the first
00836          * with BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey */
00837         if (facepa[i]==totpart || cfra < (pars+facepa[i])->time)
00838             mindex = totvert+totpart;
00839         else 
00840             mindex = totvert+facepa[i];
00841 
00842         mf= &mface[i];
00843 
00844         /* set face vertices to exist in particle group */
00845         BLI_edgehash_insert(vertpahash, mf->v1, mindex, NULL);
00846         BLI_edgehash_insert(vertpahash, mf->v2, mindex, NULL);
00847         BLI_edgehash_insert(vertpahash, mf->v3, mindex, NULL);
00848         if (mf->v4)
00849             BLI_edgehash_insert(vertpahash, mf->v4, mindex, NULL);
00850     }
00851 
00852     /* make new vertice indexes & count total vertices after duplication */
00853     ehi= BLI_edgehashIterator_new(vertpahash);
00854     for (; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi)) {
00855         BLI_edgehashIterator_setValue(ehi, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(totdup));
00856         totdup++;
00857     }
00858     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
00859 
00860     /* the final duplicated vertices */
00861     explode= CDDM_from_template(dm, totdup, 0,totface-delface, 0, 0);
00862     mtface = CustomData_get_layer_named(&explode->faceData, CD_MTFACE, emd->uvname);
00863     /*dupvert= CDDM_get_verts(explode);*/
00864 
00865     /* getting back to object space */
00866     invert_m4_m4(imat,ob->obmat);
00867 
00868     psmd->psys->lattice = psys_get_lattice(&sim);
00869 
00870     /* duplicate & displace vertices */
00871     ehi= BLI_edgehashIterator_new(vertpahash);
00872     for (; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi)) {
00873         MVert source;
00874         MVert *dest;
00875 
00876         /* get particle + vertex from hash */
00877         BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(ehi, &ed_v1, &ed_v2);
00878         ed_v2 -= totvert;
00879         v= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(ehi));
00880 
00881         dm->getVert(dm, ed_v1, &source);
00882         dest = CDDM_get_vert(explode,v);
00883 
00884         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, explode, ed_v1, v, 1);
00885         *dest = source;
00886 
00887         if (ed_v2 != totpart) {
00888             /* get particle */
00889             pa= pars + ed_v2;
00890 
00891             psys_get_birth_coordinates(&sim, pa, &birth, 0, 0);
00892 
00893             state.time=cfra;
00894             psys_get_particle_state(&sim, ed_v2, &state, 1);
00895 
00896             vertco=CDDM_get_vert(explode,v)->co;
00897             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat,vertco);
00898 
00899             sub_v3_v3(vertco, birth.co);
00900 
00901             /* apply rotation, size & location */
00902             sub_qt_qtqt(rot, state.rot, birth.rot);
00903             mul_qt_v3(rot, vertco);
00904 
00905             if (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_PaSize)
00906                 mul_v3_fl(vertco,pa->size);
00907 
00908             add_v3_v3(vertco, state.co);
00909 
00910             mul_m4_v3(imat, vertco);
00911         }
00912     }
00913     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
00914 
00915     /*map new vertices to faces*/
00916     for (i=0,u=0; i<totface; i++) {
00917         MFace source;
00918         int orig_v4;
00919 
00920         if (facepa[i]!=totpart) {
00921             pa=pars+facepa[i];
00922 
00923             if (pa->alive==PARS_UNBORN && (emd->flag&eExplodeFlag_Unborn)==0) continue;
00924             if (pa->alive==PARS_ALIVE && (emd->flag&eExplodeFlag_Alive)==0) continue;
00925             if (pa->alive==PARS_DEAD && (emd->flag&eExplodeFlag_Dead)==0) continue;
00926         }
00927 
00928         dm->getTessFace(dm,i,&source);
00929         mf=CDDM_get_tessface(explode,u);
00930         
00931         orig_v4 = source.v4;
00932 
00933         if (facepa[i]!=totpart && cfra < pa->time)
00934             mindex = totvert+totpart;
00935         else 
00936             mindex = totvert+facepa[i];
00937 
00938         source.v1 = edgecut_get(vertpahash, source.v1, mindex);
00939         source.v2 = edgecut_get(vertpahash, source.v2, mindex);
00940         source.v3 = edgecut_get(vertpahash, source.v3, mindex);
00941         if (source.v4)
00942             source.v4 = edgecut_get(vertpahash, source.v4, mindex);
00943 
00944         DM_copy_tessface_data(dm,explode,i,u,1);
00945 
00946         *mf = source;
00947 
00948         /* override uv channel for particle age */
00949         if (mtface) {
00950             float age = (cfra - pa->time)/pa->lifetime;
00951             /* Clamp to this range to avoid flipping to the other side of the coordinates. */
00952             CLAMP(age, 0.001f, 0.999f);
00953 
00954             mtf = mtface + u;
00955 
00956             mtf->uv[0][0] = mtf->uv[1][0] = mtf->uv[2][0] = mtf->uv[3][0] = age;
00957             mtf->uv[0][1] = mtf->uv[1][1] = mtf->uv[2][1] = mtf->uv[3][1] = 0.5f;
00958         }
00959 
00960         test_index_face(mf, &explode->faceData, u, (orig_v4 ? 4 : 3));
00961         u++;
00962     }
00963 
00964     /* cleanup */
00965     BLI_edgehash_free(vertpahash, NULL);
00966 
00967     /* finalization */
00968     CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(explode);
00969     CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(explode);
00970     CDDM_calc_normals(explode);
00971 
00972     if (psmd->psys->lattice) {
00973         end_latt_deform(psmd->psys->lattice);
00974         psmd->psys->lattice= NULL;
00975     }
00976 
00977     return explode;
00978 }
00979 
00980 static ParticleSystemModifierData * findPrecedingParticlesystem(Object *ob, ModifierData *emd)
00981 {
00982     ModifierData *md;
00983     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= NULL;
00984 
00985     for (md=ob->modifiers.first; emd!=md; md=md->next) {
00986         if (md->type==eModifierType_ParticleSystem)
00987             psmd= (ParticleSystemModifierData*) md;
00988     }
00989     return psmd;
00990 }
00991 static DerivedMesh * applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00992                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00993                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00994                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00995 {
00996     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00997     ExplodeModifierData *emd= (ExplodeModifierData*) md;
00998     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd=findPrecedingParticlesystem(ob,md);
00999 
01000     DM_ensure_tessface(dm); /* BMESH - UNTIL MODIFIER IS UPDATED FOR MPoly */
01001 
01002     if (psmd) {
01003         ParticleSystem * psys=psmd->psys;
01004 
01005         if (psys==NULL || psys->totpart==0) return derivedData;
01006         if (psys->part==NULL || psys->particles==NULL) return derivedData;
01007         if (psmd->dm==NULL) return derivedData;
01008 
01009         /* 1. find faces to be exploded if needed */
01010         if (emd->facepa == NULL ||
01011             psmd->flag&eParticleSystemFlag_Pars ||
01012             emd->flag&eExplodeFlag_CalcFaces ||
01013             MEM_allocN_len(emd->facepa) / sizeof(int) != dm->getNumTessFaces(dm))
01014         {
01015             if (psmd->flag & eParticleSystemFlag_Pars)
01016                 psmd->flag &= ~eParticleSystemFlag_Pars;
01017             
01018             if (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_CalcFaces)
01019                 emd->flag &= ~eExplodeFlag_CalcFaces;
01020 
01021             createFacepa(emd,psmd,derivedData);
01022         }
01023         /* 2. create new mesh */
01024         if (emd->flag & eExplodeFlag_EdgeCut) {
01025             int *facepa = emd->facepa;
01026             DerivedMesh *splitdm=cutEdges(emd,dm);
01027             DerivedMesh *explode=explodeMesh(emd, psmd, md->scene, ob, splitdm);
01028 
01029             MEM_freeN(emd->facepa);
01030             emd->facepa=facepa;
01031             splitdm->release(splitdm);
01032             return explode;
01033         }
01034         else
01035             return explodeMesh(emd, psmd, md->scene, ob, derivedData);
01036     }
01037     return derivedData;
01038 }
